title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Therapeutic Patient Education (TPE) Practice Skills in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Patient treatment planning and educational processes can be systematically designed through VR simulations
Three or more educational strategies reflecting individual patient needs can be proposed applying student-centered instructional methods
The TPE process (assessment-planning-execution-monitoring) can be applied with over 80% accuracy in simulation evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
